publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7125 Iain Smith: Falkland, Champion of Championsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the community of the Royal Burgh of Falkland on winning the prestigious Royal Horticultural Society Britain in Bloom Champion of Champions award for the second year running; considers that this is the culmination of many years of dedicated work by the Falkland in Bloom Committee with the unstinting support of the residents of Falkland, and looks forward to many more years of blooming success for Falkland.
